00057 /// see Client::ClientEventId
00058 enum ClientEventId
00059 {
00060    CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_CREATED   , // connection has been created
00061    CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_DESTROYED , // connection has been destroyed
00062    CLI_EVT_CONNECT_ERROR        , // error when trying to connect
00063    CLI_EVT_RECV_COMPLETE        , // a complete message ahs arrived
00064    CLI_EVT_RECV_TIMEOUT         , // not one byte of a message arrived
00065    CLI_EVT_SEND_COMPLETE        , // a message was successfully sent
00066    CLI_EVT_INVALID_COMMAND      , // command (send, etc) invalid in the context
00067 };
00068 
00069 /// see Client::ClientErrorType
00070 enum ClientErrorType
00071 {
00072    CLI_ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED = 1 ,  // connection closed by server
00073    CLI_ERR_SOCKET_ERROR          ,  // socket error
00074    CLI_ERR_FORMAT_ERROR          ,  // invalid format on the wire
00075    CLI_ERR_TIMEOUT_SEND          ,  // server has froze, got stuck, etc
00076    CLI_ERR_FORCED_CLOSE          ,  // connection closed by application
00077 };
